underlying_goal: Rename the Ghostty config file to get a better icon in VSCode.
primary_success: Understood the user's underlying goal (better VSCode icons) even when it contradicted conventional naming, and correctly performed the file rename and updated all references in the deploy script and documentation.
brief_summary: The user wanted to rename their Ghostty config file to get a better icon in VSCode. Claude initially explained why the existing name was conventional but, after understanding the user's goal, correctly performed the rename and updated the deploy script and docs.
